title-english: Bint Al Nil at the Revolution Exhibition
creator: Bint Al Nil
description-english: The article features the photo exhibition held to mark the second anniversary of the 23 July Revolution in which the Bint Al Nil journal took part.
description-arabic: تتحدث هذه المقالة عن مشاركة مجلة (بنت النيل) في معرض الصور الذي أقيم بمناسبة الذكرى الثانية لثورة 23 يوليو 1952.
subject: Women's rights -- Egypt; Women -- Arab countries -- Periodicals
source: From: Bint Al Nil at the Revolution Exhibition
